website_summaries.verdict: A tasteful urn that can be personalized. Its a beautiful option that displays nicely without being overly obvious of its purpose, but won't work for very large animals.
pros: Offers a gorgeous yet minimalist final resting spot for small animals, as it offers a sleek, fuss-free design
Nicely crafted metal build with engravable back
comes in several colors and 3 sizes
cons: Doesn't come in sizes for animals over 70 pounds, which is somewhat limiting compared to some other options available

customer_reviews.title: It's still very pretty. I ordered the large and my dog's remains ...
customer_reviews.text: The urn is well made and the cap screws down tightly which I appreciate. The color may not be what you expect. I was thinking it would be more copper but the one I received has a lot of greenish blues in it. It's still very pretty. I ordered the large and my dog's remains fit just right, she was seventy pounds of love. :( Sorry you are having to shop for this...
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Rest in peace sweet Star, we love you
customer_reviews.text: Having to shop for this product absolutely sucks, and I'm really sorry you're having to do this too. We ordered the Pewter with brass paws in the small size, for our 12 year old pug. She was just under 15lbs when she passed, and her remains fit in the small urn just so. It's very pretty, our girl was fawn and the colors remind us of her. It's quite heavy, and obviously durable. The lid screws on which I appreciate, it's a nice touch. This is much nicer than the flower print tin she came back to us in. Again, I'm sorry you're having to shop for this... thank you for being such a loving owner for your buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: He's gone, but he'll be with us always
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying thank you so much for providing a beautiful resting place for my best friend! My urn arrived today. Gadget was 28 lbs on the day he died, and his ashes fit well in this urn, with plenty of room to spare (see photos). It's a sad time in our house, but I'm glad to lay him to rest in this legacy container.
customer_reviews.author: JP_RN

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got the bigger size
customer_reviews.text: This urn is beautiful and not knowing what size would be good, I got the “large” even though my Lulu was approximately 50lbs. Her ashes fit comfortably inside and there was room to put a lock of her hair (inside a small plastic bag) and if I wanted to put her clay paw print inside there would be room. The only issue is the paw prints looked a little messy but it’s very minor, some of the others I saw looked better. Otherwise I am happy with her final resting place. She’s home with us and that is really all that matters. This has been a very difficult 2 weeks and I know we will miss our girl forever 😢💔.
customer_reviews.author: Denise G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and so appropriate.
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful urn as a memorial to my 22 year old lifetime feline friend. The colors are deep, like our long lasting relationship, paws adorable, it is heavy and high quality, and includes a velvet purple bag in which to put her ashes. Something like this is important when your beloved pet whom you've known for more than half of your life has passed on. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good item for what its purpose is
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item, if you are searching this product it means you lost a good friend/family member so sorry for your loss. My 5 year old mutt had to be put down and we cremated him. He weighed 40 lbs at the time. His ashed filled around halfway on the large size and there was enough room for his collar. Good looking piece and it sits on our mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Lurker

customer_reviews.title: The urn has a nice oily color to it
customer_reviews.text: So sorry for anyone having to browse here :-( I got two of these urns, so both of us could have a part of Meadow with us. The urn has a nice oily color to it, not black, not brown, a combo of both...just like my dog whose ashes it will hold. This is the prefect size if you want to keep maybe a cup of ashes. I plan to sprinkle the rest of my dog in her favorite places, and just keep a smaller part of her with me, in this urn and in a necklace urn. The cover to this is nice and secure too.
customer_reviews.author: The Senator

customer_reviews.title: Etching lines
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings about this one. In the picture I posted you can see all the etching lines and it looks a bit sloppy. From a distance, you can barely tell. Looking at the pictures the seller posted for the urn, now, I see the etching lines also so it's not like they retouched the picture or anything and made you think there wasn't any. It seems like a high quality, heavy duty piece of metal and I'm happy to put my pet's ashes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Love this urn!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend passed away two months ago. I paid $80 for a urn just like this one only i think this urn is better! My last urns lid slipped off the tracks when i was closing it and it was impossible to open! I was devastated! Luckily my boys ashes were still inside a bag, my husband had to bust it open and this is why I purchased this one. I absolutely love it! Delievery was fast! Packaging was neat! It's easy to open and close. They even give you a small bag for the urn. And it's very well priced! i am very happy with my purchase! Thank you best friend services!
customer_reviews.author: Maleaha

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful. Perfect for my baby boy Chase
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. Perfect for my baby boy Chase. I got the medium to carry some of his ashes, the rest will be buried in our yard. The small would have worked fine, the medium is a little big for my use but it is very nice looking so I'm keeping it. I'm sorry you are looking for one of these, pet loss is devistating, they are a part of our families. My baby is missed terribly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Salatino

customer_reviews.title: Dignified Vessel for my Blessed Buddy
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough thing to review. Anyone who buys an urn for there pet surely loved them dearly and it’s very hard to find something “good enough” to be their final resting place. It’s taken me almost two months to be able to write a review for this item, but I want to say that it’s wonderfully crafted and quite beautiful. I’ve held it and cried many times and my tears have not caused it to tarnish one bit. There are options out there for hundreds of dollars but I can’t imagine they would be any better than this one. It truly is a dignified vessel for my little boy to rest in. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color shipped.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Raku brass color (which is the color on box) and got WHITE . My baby is coming back and now I don't have what I need. The overall quality seems fine. Which is why I am giving 2 stars. The fact that whoever checks items of a product like this is not good. I will now have to return and buy again. Kinda sad. I dreaded buying this to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Rouxlette

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: One of our cats recently passed away after a battle with congestive heart failure, and we decided to cremate her. I was looking for a unique urn, something simple, nothing old fashioned, that I would actually like to have out on display. I really liked the look of this, and decided to go with the largest one, so that when our other cat passes, we can keep them together in the same urn. It’s plenty big for 2 cats. The urn is well designed, of heavy weight and quality. It’s hard to make choices during the emotional time of losing a pet, but I’m glad I made the choice to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: CarDude

customer_reviews.title: Is nice, heavy/sturdy but doesn't engrave well.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and feels well-built. But the engraver told me I should get a refund as it chips (the white paint from the black base coat) worse than any he's ever worked on. From a few feet away you can't really tell. If you don't get it engraved or instead have a plate or pedestal engraved, this will work nicely and seems to have a little more room than anticipated. I had no trouble like other reviewers, with the top getting stuck (I think they likely cross-threaded it as it has fine threading. so just be gentle) R.I.P. Jack
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Rest in peace, sweet boy.
customer_reviews.text: Glad we got this for our boy. He was 12 when he passed & about 66 pounds of love. His ashes fit fine in the large size along with his collar and his death certificate. It looks really nice and the top twists close. It's very secure and quite heavy. I was really impressed with the quality. For $45 you cant beat it. Much better than the flower covered tin box the vet gave us his ashes in ♡
customer_reviews.author: B. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations...
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and it is beautiful! Well hand crafted, lovely color and a little heavier than expected. The picture doesn't do it justice at all. I'm very pleased with this purchase. I've been watching and waiting to see if the price might go down, but did not want to miss out and not be able to get it at all. Now that I have it, I realize this is worth way more than the 31.50 I paid. This is a piece I will cherish, just as I cherish my beautiful dogs. Thank you for such a unique and lovely urn! P.S. It also came with a beautiful bag!
customer_reviews.author: 🦊KF🦊

customer_reviews.title: Good material, coating is iffy.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good quality and sturdy. It is pretty and heavy so it will stay in place and not easily move or be nudged cleaning. The shipment was on time which is important also. The reason one star was removed is because the covering of color is thin and chips easily. It was missing a chunk of coating(just metal exposed) when it arrived, I just turned it towards the wall to not be seen. This would also be good for even a new coating or etching as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Not right color but stays shut
customer_reviews.text: It was not the right color at all. Picture looked pink and this is like a dark brownish color. My dog weighed 80 lbs and her ashes fit in the container but it is like full to the brim. It stays shut well, and comes with a nice cover.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, sturdy, simple and cute urn.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and sturdy. Great fit, size and white color. Perfect for my 8.5lbs dog's ashes. A lot of ample room even with ashes in a slide ziploc. I only wish there's was an option to personalize with her name on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Special enough...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sidekick of 15 years. Buggy was a Russian Blue who sat with me when I read, slept on me at night, and kept me company as I moved around the house during the day. When she was diagnosed with inoperable oral cancer, I started looking for the right urn. This is perfect. Buggy was gray, as Russian Blues are. This container is special enough for my Bug.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Easley for Blue Cat Review

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small urn
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect small urn for my beloved Eddie. It's very classy and sturdy, and sits on the fireplace mantle. Just be aware that it is for small pets, and order size accordingly. He was 10 pounds and there is still plenty of room inside. I hope this helps. Always a tough time, but was very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this urn to hold the ashes of my beloved dog, who passed away not too long ago. This urn is beautiful in person, and is well-made with a screw-on lid. It arrived in perfect condition and soon after I placed my pup's ashes inside. I like the velvet drawstring bag that came with it, though I use it like a koozy (cozy? coozy?) for the urn. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: May not be exactly like photos shown.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the white that shows 2 paws on cover, I received a white urn but it has only 1 large paw on the cover. It's fine but I do like the 2 paw style better , I'm a little disappointed but I'm keeping it for my 12 lbs. Bolognese dog , she was all white and died from incurable congestive heart failure at 13 yrs 11 mos old. There is plenty of room for her ashes in the urn. And I am very sorry for your loss if you are shopping for these types of products.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The brass urn with a raku mostly cranberry swirl finish is beautiful. Quite sturdy and heavy with a secure screw on lid. This is the product that the cremation group offered however this was one third of the cost. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DLS Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Although I was sadden deeply for the need to purchase this item, I must say it is of great quality and craftsmanship. I lost my 13 year old Cocker Spaniel earlier this year and the small size was adequate for his ashes . The urn has a polished finish and is quite sturdy and has an air tight seal. I placed the urn in my curio .
customer_reviews.author: Christa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was beautiful and well packaged. I wish it came in a larger size. Unfortunately, the large wasn't big enough for our 68 lb. lab mix. This was the first time I've ever had to shop for a pet urn and it was awful but I do not regret this purchase. The return was simple and we were able to find another product that was big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amber C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect final resting place
customer_reviews.text: I am SO pleased with this product! Gorgeous color and perfect size. A beautiful and lovely piece of art to honor the final resting place of our beloved family member. My Chow Chow was a sweet soul and this urn does him justice. I feel so much better now knowing I have him in this beautiful urn safe n sound. He was 65 pounds and there was plenty of room for him to rest comfortably in the size Large urn. Sturdy and heavy with tightly sealed cap. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alinatlc

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful urn for a pet. It was shiney and had no cosmetic damage and came quickly and nicely packed in a box. Also came with a purple velvet pouch and my 55 lb dog fit in the large dog urn just fine with his velvet bag he came cremated in. It was also easy to open and locked down nicely had some weight to it as well
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE.. WHITE IS NOT ENGRAVEABLE!  Paint chipped & had to be removed
customer_reviews.text: The white paint in the screw-top threads flaked off when I initially opened the urn. The description states that this is engraveable. The paint chipped badly when the jeweler attempted to engrave it and had to be completely removed in order to complete the engraving. That changed the color to bronze. I wanted a small WHITE engraveable urn for my white Maltese & thought this would have been perfect. The return window is now closed so this is money wasted - on the urn and engraving. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RLJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: Con: The lid needed to be screwed on/off several times to get it easy to close, especially if you're alone . You don't want the jar to jiggle while filling. Best to have two people. Pro: I hung his collar around the jar with his tags showing.
customer_reviews.author: LizyLiz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful resting place for our beloved cat.
customer_reviews.text: The urn was much smaller than anticipated but ended up being larger than we needed for our tiny girl (>7lb. Cat). It feels like good quality and it's exactly as pictured. You need to use caution when screwing the lid on and off so that the you don't cross the threads. We're really thankful we found something that lets us keep a dear member of our family with us in a lovely way.
customer_reviews.author: Momorama

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Nice, & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before realizing a similar urn was included with my pet's cremation. I had planned to return it. However I received it and I was so impressed, I used it for another pet who had passed previously. I can't express how attractive, nice, and sturdy this urn is. I am so glad I checked Amazon and found this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gushard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn for an extremely Special Australian Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Urn for my Australian Shepherd that passed away at age 14. I purchased this Urn a few months ago but had to wait to post my comments. It was actually nicer in person than the view on Amazon showed. Highly recommend this Urn and this Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ottum

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: We recently lost our beloved dog after 14 years of an amazing devoted relationship. Our desire to honor this wonderful animal brought us to search for and purchase two urns. I have never written a review on any purchase, but am compelled to do so about the Best Friend Services Urns. Both urns are beautiful. The quality and workmanship is evident in the detail and immaculate finish. Sturdy and well weighted, both more than met our need and display beautifully in our two homes. We could have spent more money, but I seriously believe that we would not have received more quality in doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive piece
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty. I ordered for my kitty's ashes. Only downside is that it cannot be engraved. I thought the description meant that seller could not engrave, but I've taken to local shops and apparently the surface is one that cannot be engraved. Disappointed by that but not sellers fault. Arrived fast and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Quilty Item
customer_reviews.text: This urn is very nice and a quality product. I liked it so much I bought another. It has good weight to it. The top screws down well. Threads are good. The finish and color are are nice. Its very well made and will buy another though not for a while, I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Spam Yee

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these. Our one cat is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. Our one cat is 19 and very sick. It is very heart breaking having to do this but no way around it. Our other cat is 17. We want the to have the same thing. We also bought a hand held engraver. We are going to have the kids engrave their names and dates on them. They are made very well and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect representation
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful product. Sits on my kitchen windowsill soaking up the Florida sunshine just as if precious one held inside would be doing if he were still physically with us.
customer_reviews.author: FangBanger

customer_reviews.title: Pewter with Brass Paws is Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship & well packed. Affordable Urn is lovely, but it is true that paw etching is primitive.... I think it adds charm to piece for a pet. Screw cap is well machined. Price About half of what the pet crematorium charged. Our 19lb cockapoo cremains left in plastic memorial packing & paper ID fit about 3/4 capacity of the medium size urn.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Our medium sized border collie fit in here just fine..
customer_reviews.text: I think we had a tiny bit of room to spare.. So if you have anything larger than a border collie you may need the large as we got the medium.. It's amazing quality for the price and we are very pleased with it. Much better than the one that the vet gave us which was a thin aluminum one... This one is very heavy duty and well built. Not flimsy garbage..
customer_reviews.author: Mountain ManTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I posted some pictures so everyone can get an idea of the size. This is a medium and enough room for my cats ashes in a bag. Container comes wrapped in the box and they give you a purple carry bag/storage bag if you need it. The container is very pretty, looks like a decorative vase in the living room. I chose the slate gray because that was the color of his fur. I miss my boy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful- As Described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother's German's Shepherd's ashes which were accompanying her in her casket. Her dog weighed approximately 65lbs at death and her ashes barely fit. So FYI.
customer_reviews.author: M Martel

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a bummer of a product any way you look at it, but if you need one of these then it's a good one. The design is simple, and the product is well made. Used this size for my dog that was about 20lbs and there was plenty of room. The small would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Xerxe

customer_reviews.title: Pictures do not do justice!
customer_reviews.text: This is stunning in person, I used this for my Rosie who was about 65lbs. It's a beautiful burgundy with an irredesent color as well. I think this makes a stunning tribute to male or female dogs. So happy I bought this and so reasonably priced!!
customer_reviews.author: TC & JC

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a hard purchase to make. It is never fun having to pick a final resting place for your beloved animal. This company was very professional and respectful with the way they cared and wrapped it up. Very great craftsmanship and quality. I had no problems with my urn.
customer_reviews.author: Dragoon

customer_reviews.title: Way to small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a large. My Dog was only 75 pounds and his ashes no way came close to fitting in a large size. The large size is definitely not large
customer_reviews.author: Gina Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium size urn for my 20lbs dogs ashes. They fit easily with a bit of extra room. The overall quality is great and it looks fantastic. A fitting final resting place for my best friend. The bag that came with it (that I didn't realize was included) is a bit cheap, but I didn't plan on using it anyways. I would've preferred if it didn't have any graphic on it. I might have kept it if it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jon Barker

customer_reviews.title: The smallest size was a perfect fit for his remains and the recent order was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we've ordered. The first was for our Boston Terrier. The smallest size was a perfect fit for his remains and the recent order was for our cat, which didn't need so much space but we wanted them to match. I appreciate that they come in different colors so we can tell them apart. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Nolte

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Medium is good for small animal I think.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely constructed. Sorry I had to buy this, but it will still give me happiness as I put it on my dresser. I would of liked a spot to engrave on if that would be possible to do. Other words it a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Campbell

customer_reviews.title: As advertised lies
customer_reviews.text: My 35lb dog passed away and my family decided to get this urn for her. Got our medium urn today that is SUPPOSED to hold up to 40lbs. This urn only fits 3/4 of her ashes. I am really disappointed in the false advertising. Because I did my homework when trying to find an urn for her. This means the medium sized urn only holds up to 30lbs. Please fix your description so no else is disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my beloved dog that past away last year. I wanted something beautiful to honor her, and this was exactly what I was looking for. I loved it so much, that when my sweet cat of 14 years past away, I got one for him too in a different color:)
customer_reviews.author: tlucky

customer_reviews.title: I’m sorry for your loss...
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry you need this product, but please know that your pet will stay close to your heart because of it. My lab was 60lbs when she passed & her remains fit into a size medium. Good quality & I’m pleased with it. May your fur baby Rest In Peace.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my little girl who passed two months ago. I was able to take it and get it and engraved and enough room to put some of her little favorite items
customer_reviews.author: jasmine robbins

customer_reviews.title: Would totally order again!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, looks just like pic, it looks great! I bought it for a friend that had a lab, he was going to burry him, so I thought I'd get one of these for him to keep some ashes, he LOVED it and its small enough that it can sit on his desk at work without being a centerpiece. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Cinball

customer_reviews.title: Classy and tasteful
customer_reviews.text: it’s a beautiful piece we have our beloved fur baby in it now and she’s on the mantle and it doesn’t look too much of an urn where it’s like wow can throw some people off when they walk in, no it’s more classy and tasteful. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect final resting place for Ebony
customer_reviews.text: I searched for several months before I selected this for my beloved black pom's ashes - it is beautiful and sits along side my welsh corgi's ashes and they will be with me always
customer_reviews.author: Billie Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had to put my beloved lab to sleep and wanted a nice urn to place his ashes in. He had lost quite a bit of weight towards the end, I am guessing he was 70 pounds. This was perfect size for his ashes and I love the overall look. I placed it in a bookshelf with his picture by it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful remembrance for a pet
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted for my sweet Bailey. It was large enough to be able to put her collar in it too. It sits where I see it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: momsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Container great, paint not so much :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the container itself, the screw top is perfect so I don't have to worry about someone spilling the ashes all over the place. I was a bit heart broken to see the paint/stain looking stuff was slopped into the paw print areas so it's not perfect. I'm hoping I can figure out how to remove the splotches so it is worthy of holding my pets ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzznickers

customer_reviews.title: ... I received this urn I was suprised of how great of quality it is
customer_reviews.text: When I received this urn I was suprised of how great of quality it is. It's heavy and fit the ashes of a 30lb dog. It's really beautiful! And this is coming from a very picky person :)
customer_reviews.author: S2592

customer_reviews.title: Very nice resting space
customer_reviews.text: Sad to have to buy this but happy my sweet boy has a beautiful box to rest in. It is very good quality and would recommend this for your special little friend. My Cliff weighed 25 pounds and there is plenty of room to spare. We will have this engraved around the lid as the top paw decoration is very small (but very nice).
customer_reviews.author: CJ1419

customer_reviews.title: good size for a medium sized dog.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the ashes of a dog I lost recently. He was 35 pounds when he died (after having been over 40 in his prime). It's about the size of a grapefruit, and had room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sacksteder

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: As described. What you see in the pic is what you get. I will say that my dog was 45lbs so I ordered the large size. It was a tight fit for him but it was the correct size none the less. Definitely follow the sizing charts and don't skimp on size.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: The End
customer_reviews.text: He was a small Maltese, his name was Rascal, he didn't have the best start to his life - he was a rescue, he had rear hip problems as he got older, he was almost blind at the end, and the time came. It became the perfect final resting spot for my small best friend, he will be remembered in a perfect way and will be with me at my end
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pet urn
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I was happy with this product. It was the right size for my pet's remains (6 lb. poodle) . The lid was a little hard to get on securely, but after trying for a few minutes, I was able to get it secured. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering was a very sad event but the product is beautiful and my beloved Wheaten will always be close by physically and living in my heart. I didn't want to be morbid but thought this urn so lovely that I ordered two more in the small size, brown color for my little mini doodles (who are years and years away from needing).
customer_reviews.author: Cali-kaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This urn was exactly what I wanted for my buddy of 15 yrs. It’s very well made I felt that I was giving my boy a proper resting place.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Sturdy, Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: I had initially ordered the small urn based on the weight scale listed in the description. Unfortunately it was to small for my dogs cremains. Returning the small urn was easy and the medium urn was delivered in a timely fashion. The only thing I will say is the medium urn is a slightly different color than the small. The small was more purple which is what I wanted but the medium is still very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a lovely jar to store ashes, even ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a lovely jar to store ashes, even though I will eventually put it in the ground. I dug up the ashes that had been in a plastic bag in a plastic container. Here they are safe forever.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy weight
customer_reviews.text: Our boxer of 13 years crossed over the rainbow bridge. This is a great way to keep her close.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Yackley

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect urn for my cats ashes. It’s sturdy and very beautiful. I did have a small issue with the bag not coming with the urn. But after messaging the seller, and telling them this, they messaged back right away apologizing. They sent out a new bag and I got it the next day. I was very impressed by their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice decorations are slightly off but over all a nice choice to use for holding your pets remains
customer_reviews.author: steven j.

customer_reviews.title: Deserved
customer_reviews.text: My dear Chloe (18+) passed away in April. Bought this for her and it is very nice. Couldn’t be any nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much for this beautiful urn. It is perfect for my little 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for this beautiful urn. It is perfect for my little 12 year old shihtzu that passed away just Sunday. The item arrived very quickly and safely. Very well made and so beautiful. Such a beautiful resting place for my baby boy. From the bottom of my heart, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ANurse

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Not exactly what I wanted to be buying. As I'd rather have my baby with me. The large holds what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and tasteful
customer_reviews.text: Depth of color slightly less than pictured, brighter/lighter, but none the less beautiful for a memorial. Also got black/silver for another pet.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product. Although I wish I didn't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Although I wish I didn't have to buy it. I am glad this is my dogs final resting place. It looks great on my shelf. The color is absolutely beautiful. I saw this product at the crematorium for double the price!
customer_reviews.author: Teanna

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I could not have chosen a more beautiful resting place for my Hunny Baby
customer_reviews.author: PageSix

customer_reviews.title: WE MISS YOU ANNA..
customer_reviews.text: Love this for the needs of our beloved dog Anna. It is very sturdy and fells secure\ly shut and enclosed. Perfect for the mantle and needs to keep our friend with us in sight. we really miss our daog buut was happy with this for the look it has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Considering the need for this item I was really disappointed in the quality if the paws on the top. The stain is not very precise and just looks messy with parts of the silver paw print colored. There is also a strong smell of stain on the inside of the urn.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great color, quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: For the affordable price I was not expecting the construction to be as good as it was. No one wants to need an item like this, but its comforting to know you wont get taken advantage of buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice urn!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice, a solid and attractive piece. I just put my 52 lb dog's ashes in it last night, and they fit beautifully with a bit of space to spare - although that is largely taken up by the ziploc they're also contained in. My only negative whatsoever - and now that the ashes are in there, maybe it's not a negative - is that it was extraordinarily hard to open; it took a few of us working at it before it loosened enough to open. Still, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great, well made, very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: After having to have our beloved dog put down, my family chose this urn. This urn is beautiful, well made and plenty large enough. She weighed nearly 50 pounds, her ‘cremains’ fit well with room to spare in the large sized urn. My condolences to whomever is going through the same difficult position, know that this particular product will be a beautiful resting place for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Climis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy and attractive. Just wish I didn’t need it tho. 😢
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Sad
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful final home for our sweet cat, Jack. Pet urns may be one of the saddest parts of this site, but I'm glad someone is offering quality options.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: The inside of this container is lined with plastic , it is very well made and would hold up for ever. I was actually very surprised that in today and age some thing is actually well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not same color or finish as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy little urn. Not same color as pictured though. Dark, glossy purple, not metallic as shown. Too much of a hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful memorial
customer_reviews.text: This urn is the perfect way to hold my sweet pup who passed away from cancer. It's a very beautiful, sturdy piece, and fitting for such a cherished pet. My only suggestion is to be very careful when screwing on the lid. The threading is very fine, and it would be easy to cross-thread.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: my mom had me order this for her.
customer_reviews.text: my mom had me order this for her. she said it was incredibly too big for what she was going for and the word "small" really threw her off
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, solid urn. The engraved paw print is well done. I had mine engraved with my girl’s name and it looks like it cost significantly more than it did. Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: EMO

customer_reviews.title: She'll always be with us
customer_reviews.text: First, I'm sorry if you are shopping for this item for your furry friend. I purchased the large size for an 80lb lab and was pleased with the solid feel and weight. This is a beautiful product for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Lid won't screw on snugly
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn't not screw on tight at all. As soon as it gets even remotely snug, it skips the threads and has to be screwed all the way down again. Poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: DuckJ13

customer_reviews.title: Lovely urn I wish I didn't need.
customer_reviews.text: Broken hearted that this was something I needed to purchase but completely satisfied. It is beautiful and the top is very secure - no chance of spilling. I can't say enough about how well made and flawless this piece is and how happy I am that I can keep my Gabriel with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfect !!!
customer_reviews.text: I HAD A 25 LBS PUG THAT PASSED, IT FIT PERFECT, tHANK YOU SO MUCH ITS BEAUTIFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Small, but beautiful & excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My Boston Terrier's remains barely fit into this piece. However, it's a beautiful, touching addition to any room I move it to.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: JUST BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: In spite of the strong pain I feel in my heart for the lost of my beloved dog, when I received the urn, my soul relieved knowing that her ashes will be saved in this beautiful room, near from me.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful resting place for furbabies.
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed, and a lovely resting place for Bobbi, Nick, and Chulita. Nick was 16 pounds and fit in the small size. Well priced, well made, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ann Sjostrom

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Beautiful, we'll made, was able to use paint pen for name and date. My little mini dachshund passed suddenly and shipping was quick so she had a decent resting place.
customer_reviews.author: pandaflake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Item and Final Resting Place.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely piece, I originally ordered a medium but had to return it for the large. The seller was quick to accommodate me and I had no problems whatsoever. I am very happy with this and would recommend the items to others, its beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Dogma101

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this urn for my beloved Chihuahua. I love the finish and the color. The lid secures very tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Slayter

product_meta.title: Best Friend Services Pet Urn - Memorial Cremation Pet Urns for Dog and Cat Ashes, Hand Carved Mia Series Urn for Pets up to 70lbs
feature_bullets: CAPACITY- Total capacity is 40 cu/in accomodating most pets up to 40 pounds. The rule of thumb is 1 cu/in per 1lb of live weight. Capacity required depends on how the ashes are processed. Most crematoriums process to a consistency similar to sand which is what this is based on.
DIMENSIONS- Overall Height = 4, Overall Width = 4 5/8, Lid Opening = 3 1/8, Wall Thickness 1/16
STRUCTURE- The urn is cast of solid cast aluminum with a threaded screw top design allowing for simple secure sealing of your pets ashes. Paws are carved by hand making each memorial slightly unique

SOPHISTICATED FINISH- Color is hand applied by an atomized painting process which creates a refined smooth even finish. Paws are plated to bring out the brilliant pewter color. The finish allows engraving by your local engraving or jewelry shop.
URNS KEEP THE MEMORIES ALIVE - You shared your pet's life, pet urns keep you pet close and the memories alive in your home
